channel.title: Tish Osborn on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Nana's Beer Stew recipe
item.description: Beer Stew From Tish Osborn- Originally from Ada Vielmetti (Nana) & Aunt Florence Burt To serve @ 6 people, use: 4 lbs. Of good Stew Meat 2 lb. Onions, thickly sliced Flour to dredge meat Oil to brown meat, in a large skillet 6 cloves of garlic, finely chopped or crushed 3T Dark Brown Sugar ¼ cup red wine vinegar ½ cup chopped fresh parsley 2 small bay leaves, put in whole
